author: sky.cactus
content: How do other editors feel about using Discord for `discussion-to` links in EIPs?  <https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3076/files>

author: lightclient
content: not an editor, but imo the `discussions-to` link should goto a location where the discussion can be saved for posterity - and discord is not strong in this aspect

author: gcolvin
content: Also needs to be to a place that is easy for the public to get to.
